name: You're in a Battle Simulator
description:
Play as a brave warrior in this battle simulator through simple levels with a little touch of humor.

Made for Weekly Game Jam 30. Theme: Not The Hero.

CONTROL:

- WASD or ARROWS KEYS to MOVE

- SPACE to ATTACK

CREDITS:

Game Engine: Godot 3

SFX: Zapslat

Music: 

- LolHank aka. That Dude From Discord - Title Screen

- OurMusicBox.com - When Good Prevails

Inspired by: Right Click to Necromance

(from which I'd shamelessly stolen the title screen design from :P)
